problem: 如图,∠MON=90°,点A,B分别在射线OM,ON上运动,BE平分∠NBA,BE的反向延长线与∠BAO的平分线交于点C,则∠C的度数是()
answer: 三角形一内角平分线与另一顶点处的外角平分线所组成的锐角等于第三个内角的一半.故选B.
problem_en: As shown in the figure, ∠MON = N_0, points A and B move on the radial lines OM and ON respectively, BE bisects ∠NBA, the reverse extended line of BE and the bisector of ∠BAO intersect at point C, then the degree of ∠C is ( )
